data.title: Higher Education - Institutions
data.meta_description: Apple powers innovation across every part of campus — from cutting-edge research and game-day athletics to daily student and faculty life.
data.text:
University of Kentucky

Giving today’s students a next gen education.

From engaging digital experiences in the classroom to cutting-edge research in the field, the University of Kentucky recognizes the importance of equal access to technology in higher education — creating an inclusive experience and path to higher achievement for all.

Read the story

Anáhuac Cancún - International University

Cultivating a new era of modern architects.

Anáhuac Cancún - International University uses iPad Pro and Apple Pencil with powerful apps to support equitable access, foster creativity, and inspire the next generation of modern architects to build sustainable and impactful solutions for the future.

Read the story

Duke University

Apple Student ID. The one‑tap wonder.

Duke University uses Apple Student ID to help students, faculty, staff, and alumni get around campus. Once they add their student ID to Apple Wallet, they can use iPhone or Apple Watch to enter dorms and libraries, ride the campus bus, and pay for meals. And it’s not just convenient — Apple Student ID keeps all their information private and secure.

Read the story

Shanghai Business School

Building apps for real‑world experience.

Shanghai Business School uses Swift and Xcode on Mac to power its innovation center. Students from every major come together in this advanced incubator space to build iOS apps that solve the problems they care about most.

Read the story

University of Nebraska–Lincoln

Powering performance from practice to game day.

The University of Nebraska–Lincoln uses Apple technology to give its entire athletics department a competitive edge. Coaches and trainers use apps on iPad to drive team performance, support wellness, and manage health. And all student athletes receive a MacBook Air to help them succeed academically.

Read the story
